1.title: The Signalman
1.plot: Watch Nick Wright take you through a day in the life of a signal man, from the mechanics of the token machine to the thrill of an on-the-track token exchange.

2.title: The Driver
2.plot: No train could possibly operate without its driver. From safety procedures, to firing the furnace, to communicating along the line, the running of the railway and the safety of the passengers rests squarely on the driver's shoulders.

3.title: The Shunters
3.plot: Without the tireless work and preservation carried out by Shunters, the railway would cease to operate smoothly. Watch a day as a Shunter and gain an appreciation.

4.title: The 1940s
4.plot: Travel back in time to the 1940s with the Severn Valley Railway, as Nick Wright takes us on a train journey across the stations, allowing us to visit the period exhibits, reenactors and vintage steam trains on display.

5.title: The Restorers
5.plot: With running a railway, repairs are vital to maintaining the high standards. We take a look at the mechanics and the work yards of the railway, to see just how much work and effort goes into maintaining these fantastic locomotives.

6.title: The Management
6.plot: Severn Valley would not run without the hard work of its team. Nick interviews the corporate ladder, from Directors to Station Masters and gets their thoughts on the past, present and future of Severn Valley Railway.

locations: Severn Valley Railway, Shropshire, England, UK::(Train Stations)
imdb.plot outline: We follow the host Nick Wright behind the scenes of Severn Valley Railway, seeing never before seen features of the railway, from the hierarchy to the heart warming volunteers, we see the love and community aspect which is all brought together by the love of the railway.
imdb.title: Inside Severn Valley Railway
plot: We follow the host Nick Wright behind the scenes of Severn Valley Railway, seeing never before seen features of the railway, from the hierarchy to the heart warming volunteers, we see the love and community aspect which is all brought together by the love of the railway.::Bobie Rahman
